HERO.PROJEXPLAIN: My colleagues highlight my technical skills as well as my

bookeando.description: Complete project, from the conception of the backend and frontend. Features Stripe, authentication, and end-to-end testing. Users can book a hotel and manage the reservation as a hospitality owner as well.

yarcoDelivery.description: Full stack food delivery app featuring auth0, Stripe for handling payments, user profiles, and advanced management. Includes order tracking, order management, and menu options.

filmmaker.description: This is my audiovisual portfolio. I merged my two passions here. You can find some of my latest work here.

IndiePodcasts.description: Web application designed for small podcasts that want to share their content in a simple and uncomplicated way. The platform allows users to easily upload, edit and delete their podcasts, offering an intuitive and responsive user experience.

CONTACT.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: I am eager to connect and explore how we can thrive together. If you're looking for dedication and creativity, I invite you to reach out. Let’s discuss how I can contribute to your team’s success.
